name: Karma (itch) (erichjag)
description:
This is a platformer game in the style of old school 30’s cartoons. The main character has the ability to move around with his spirit to take over other people and by using them complete puzzles.

Story: Main character Richard and his sister Betty were captured by some scientists and tested on. Richard was able to escape and is now on the run.

Controls:
Movement: WASD keys
Jump: space
Taking someone over: right click to leave body and right click again to take body over Middle mouse button to suicide.
Left click to activate levers.
